meanings.definition: （ポーランドの）レポロン（架空の物質/概念）
meanings.english_definition: A fictional Polish substance/concept (possibly from internet/slang usage)

examples.translation: この装置はレポロン技術を使用しています

examples.sentence: Legend says repolon has magical properties.
examples.translation: 伝説によればレポロンには魔法の特性がある

meanings.notes: This appears to be an invented/niche term with no established definition. May derive from Polish internet culture or gaming contexts.

etymology.value: Likely Polish origin (re- + Polon [Poland]). May reference Poland (Polska) or polonium (chemical element Po). Exact origins unclear - possibly internet meme or gaming item.

usage_notes.explanation: This term has no established meaning in standard English. Appears in some online Polish contexts possibly as: 1) Fictional material 2) Inside joke/reference 3) Gaming item 4) Parody of scientific terms. Usage extremely limited.

level_frequency.note: Virtually nonexistent in mainstream English usage
